documentation.title: Disallow Alternative Control Structure Syntax
documentation.standard: The use of the alternative syntax for control structures is not allowed.
documentation.code_comparison: <<<<<<< HEAD ======= >>>>>>> ddb2375 (fix: console error) if ($foo) { $var = 1; } while (++$i < 10) { echo $i; } <<<<<<< HEAD ======= >>>>>>> ddb2375 (fix: console error) if ($foo) : $var = 1; endif; while (++$i < 10): echo $i; endwhile;
